description:
Christian is Shane's friend. They are both from Toronto.
Christian has a lot of stamina. This video has been edited for time but I think we were at it for over an hour. My back hurt by the time it was over, but it was well worth it.
Christian is tall and lean with a nice swimmer's build and a very large uncut cock. He's not shy at all and didn't mind showing off his body (including his asshole). Plus, he ejaculates twice.
title: Christian
